title: Suitcase preview
content:
I can't make suitcase preview my fonts correctly. I have   
5 related designs in FontLab, all separate files. When   
I generate either truetype, type 1 or OTF then drop them   
into suitcase the preveiw will only show one or two   
fonts, or none at all. But when I use them in illustrator   
they seem to work fine and dandy. Can anybody help?
author: kris
